hero.title: Communication without language barriers with Supertext - more than a simple translator
hero.description_line1: Communicate faster, better and easier. With Supertext, you can translate content in no time at all. Become fluent in all national languages - era rumantsch! {br} {br} Thanks to the latest generation of artificial intelligence (AI), you will be able to translate various file formats in different languages with just one click. Our translation AI is constantly learning. And you can count on continuous further development with new helpful features. {br} {br} Whether for private individuals, small companies or large organizations - Supertext offers your innovative translation solution, operated on Swiss servers in accordance with the highest security standards.

register_section.title: Benefit even more from the Supertext translation software
register_section.description: Get more translation performance for free: Register for our free plan. By doing so, you actively help to make the Supertext translator even better.

partners_section.title: These companies already communicate multilingually - uniformly and securely
partners_section.cta_text: Our customized business solution for your company

reviews_section.title: Our users are fluent in at least five languages

reviews.text: I love you guys! Your website saves me every day with the Swiss German translations!
Cool tool, I really like the option to correct the translation suggestions individually.
The only useful translated website when it comes to translating Schwitzer German into High German.
Best translation aid I know; really very helpful.
I particularly like the fact that Romansh is included.

footer.title: These companies already communicate in multiple languages - consistently and with style

cookieBanner.textPrefix: We use cookies to continuously improve our website. By clicking "Accept", you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our cookie policy
cookieBanner.textSuffix: agree. Alternatively, you can specify your preferred settings by clicking on "More options".

modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.descriptionPrefix: You can choose which cookies should be set when you use our website by adjusting your settings. You can find more information in our
modal.necessaryDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be deactivated. Generally, they are only set in response to actions you take in connection with a service request, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. Necessary cookies do not store any personal information.
modal.performanceDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so that we can measure and improve the performance of our website. They help us to see how visitors use our services and features. All the information they collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not use these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our website and will not be able to monitor its performance.
